alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Franklin; Inland Wakulla; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 2:46PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Wakulla, southeastern Liberty and Franklin Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 246 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles northwest of Carrabelle, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Carrabelle, Carrabelle Beach, Alligator Point, East Camp, Morgan Place, Saint Teresa, Turkey Point, Royal Bluff, Mcintyre, High Bluff, Yent Place, Owens Bridge, Sumatra, Lanark Village, Twin Pole, Poplar Camp and Curtis Mill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Franklin; Inland Wakulla; Liberty
